put.description: Validations:</br>- cannot change customer, agreement, type if it's set</br>- the combination of request type, sub type and previous offer type should be valid with hierarchy type</br>

Validations:</br>- Agreement Start Date and Agreement End Date dates are required. Start Date should be before End Date</br>- cannot edit common offer settings for offer type 4, 6.</br>- GPI Cycle is required</br>- HIC type is required</br>- Fuel Interval is required</br>- Fuel Event Type is required</br>- Payment Terms Type is required</br>- Transportation (Days) is required</br>- Payment Terms Transportation Clock Start is required</br>- Duties & Taxes DTU (Days) is required</br>- Duties & Taxes DTP (Days) is required</br>- Billing Cycle - Outbound is required</br>- Billing Cycle - Inbound is required</br>- Billing Cycle DTU is required</br>- Billing Cycle DTP is required</br>
Validations:</br>- all offer under opportunity must be New, Cancelled, Abandoned</br>

Validations:</br>- cloning is available only for offers in the status NEW</br>- offer cloning for offers with type T4, T6 that was previously copied from active agreement scope is prohibited</br>- offer cloning for offers with type T3, T7 is prohibited</br>- cannot clone offer from different region</br>

Validations:</br>- Agreement Start Date and Agreement End Date dates are required. Start Date should be before End Date</br>- if country settings is locked then now changes are allowed</br>- cannot change MCPID for offer with type 3</br>- for child offer project tag is mango and cannot be used by other child offer</br>
Validations:</br>- offer unlocking is possible only to the offers in the following statuses:"Offer completed" and "OARS Text generated"</br>- offer unlocking is possible only to locked offers</br>
Validations:</br>- update of the custom OARS text is not allowed for the offer of type T3, T7.</br>
Validations:</br>- country scope cannot be changed for this offer type

Validations:</br>- cannot edit common offer settings for offer type 4, 6.</br>- GPI Cycle is required</br>- HIC type is required</br>- Fuel Interval is required</br>- Fuel Event Type is required</br>- Payment Terms Type is required</br>- Transportation (Days) is required</br>- Payment Terms Transportation Clock Start is required</br>- Duties & Taxes DTU (Days) is required</br>- Duties & Taxes DTP (Days) is required</br>- Billing Cycle - Outbound is required</br>- Billing Cycle - Inbound is required</br>- Billing Cycle DTU is required</br>- Billing Cycle DTP is required</br>- Agreement Start Date and Agreement End Date dates are required. Start Date should be before End Date</br>
Validations:</br>- cannot cancel offer with only with statuses New, Sent to GRE, MCPID selected, Simulation completed, Offer completed, OARS text generated</br>
Validations:</br>- cannot only abandon an offer with status Submitted to Customer</br>- offer sent to GRE cannot be Abandoned anymore</br>

put.description: Validations:</br>- related offer cannot be blocked</br>- only version with status Verified or Activation Failed (with warnings) can be activated</br>- could not be other version which is in activation or failed activation</br>

Validations:</br>- selected row needs to be NEW</br>
Validations:</br>- selected row needs to be generated</br>

Validations:</br>- project tag is required</br>- the project tag cannot be used by other child offer</br>- region is required</br>- there must be parent offer region under opportunity</br>- cannot create offer with other region then Global for harmonized offers</br>- cannot create more offer for harmonized offers</br>- required is required</br>- project tag is required</br>- project tag is prohibited for parent offer</br>- cannot create new offer iff all others have the status OARS text generated</br>- cannot create new offer if there are active or submitted to customer</br>- creation of the offer is not allowed for the opportunity with offer type T3, T7</br>- cannot create new offer when opportunity status is ABANDONED, ACTIVATED, CANCELLED, ARCHIVED.</br>- region is required is parent offer</br>- cannot create more then one parent offer for region</br>- cannot select only global region for harmonized offer</br>- cannot select global region for non harmonized offer</br>
Validations:</br>- the combination of request type, sub type and previous offer type should be valid with hierarchy type</br>
Validations:</br>- only for types T1, T2, T4, T6 the new round can be created</br>

Validations:</br>- "Submit offer to the customer" is available only for the offers in the status "OARS text generated"</br>- "Submit offer to the customer" is available only for offers with "Offer Pack" Rate Cards generated</br>
Validations:</br>- cannot create duplicated OARS text</br>
Validations:</br>- "Publish to GRE" action is only available for offers with status New</br>- "Publish to GRE" action is only available for offers containing at least one country</br>

Validations:</br>- operation is not supported for offer type differ then T3. To activate offer with type other than type 3, please go through MCCPA activation process</br>- cannot activate offer with status other then OARS Text Generated</br>

Validations:</br>- check if accounts are match with these set in GRE</br>- if country has accounts assigned under MCCPA varsion</br>- all countries must be in scope of offer</br>- MCCPA version should be NEW to process verify</br>
Validations:</br>- version needs to be activated</br>
Validations:</br>- cannot run global to local action for this version. Version need to be GTL and verified</br>
Validations:</br>- cannot run global to local action for this version. Version need to be LCPA and verified.</br>

Validations:</br>- version needs have start date</br>- version start date and date should be before now</br>- cannot create new GTL/LCPA version because there is another one in progress.</br>- status of version must be active</br>
Validations:</br>- the upload could be only for version NEW or VERIFIED</br>
Validations:</br>- content is validated like during validation process</br>- file could be process for version with status VERIFIED, ACTIVATION_FAILED, ACTIVATION_FAILED_WARN, NEW</br>

Validations:</br>- related offer cannot be blocked</br>- only version with status Verified or Activation Failed (with warnings) can be activated</br>- could not be other version which is in activation or failed activation</br>
